bugPattern.name: bug_first try
bugPattern.description: incorrect response with an unexpected RST on state of established(during rcv).

bugPattern.name: invalid_response_to_synack1
bugPattern.description: response with out a correct RST for SYN_ACK input on state of fin_wait1/2.

bugPattern.name: invalid_response_to_synack2
bugPattern.description: response with out a correct RST for SYN_ACK input on state of established.

bugPattern.name: invalid_response_to_synack3
bugPattern.description: response with out a correct RST for SYN_ACK input on state of last_ack.
